name: Fish Burger with Savoury Coleslaw
description: Move aside beef burgers, this heart healthy alternative will blow you out of the water! Piled high with crunchy coleslaw, it’s the perfect summer BBQ food.

ingredients.name: Burger Seasoning or West Coast Burger Seasoning

preparation: Brush fish with oil, and then sprinkle with seasoning.
Grill over medium-high heat with lid closed until cooked through, 4 minutes per side.
Combine coleslaw and Big Burger Sauce in a bowl.
Place fish on bottom halves of buns, then divide coleslaw overtop. Top with buns and serve.

products.name: Burger Seasoning
summary: Tired of bland burgers? Level up with one simple seasoning that’s packed with the robust flavours of onion, garlic, and red bell pepper, and a mild paprika kick. Just combine the seasoning with ground beef, chicken, pork, or turkey for mouth-watering burgers every single time.

products.name: West Coast Burger Seasoning
summary: A West Coast-inspired blend that's perfect for making salmon burgers after a full day in the sun!

products.name: Big Burger Sauce Mix
summary: The tastiest burger sauce on this side of the golden arches. Best of all, it’s free of sodium and preservatives. Simply mix the seasoning with mayo, ketchup, and relish, and you’ve got saucy goodness to slather on burgers, sandwiches, sausages, and hot dogs.
